corda / net.corda.core.contracts / AuthenticatedObject

AuthenticatedObject

data class AuthenticatedObject<out T : Any>

Wraps an object that was signed by a public key, which may be a well known/recognised institutional key.

Wraps an object that was signed by a public key, which may be a well known/recognised institutional key.
